mapper.update:
update atm_comm_charge_invoice
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bill_id = #{billId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
invoice_number = #{invoiceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invoice_date = #{invoiceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
invoice_fee = #{invoiceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
invoice_rate = #{invoiceRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
invoice_model_id = #{invoiceModelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag_start_charge = #{flagStartCharge,jdbcType=BIT},
flag_finish_charge = #{flagFinishCharge,jdbcType=BIT},
flag_deleted = #{flagDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
create_invoice_time = #{createInvoiceTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_invoice_person = #{createInvoicePerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_invoice_time = #{updateInvoiceTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_invoice_person = #{updateInvoicePerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_person = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select chargeInvoice.id AS id, chargeInvoice.invoice_number AS invoiceNumber, invoiceModel.invoice_title AS invoiceTitle, chargeInvoice.invoice_fee AS invoiceFee, invoiceModel.invoice_type AS invoiceType, chargeInvoice.update_time AS updateTime, chargeInvoice.create_invoice_time AS createInvoiceTime from atm_comm_charge_invoice chargeInvoice INNER JOIN dmi_invoice_model invoiceModel ON invoiceModel.id = chargeInvoice.invoice_model_id where chargeInvoice.bill_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND chargeInvoice.flag_deleted = 0
